results.title: Carmel: storyteller
results.brief_description: Carmel is a retired school teacher, wife, mother and grandmother. Her family’ s life dramatically changed when she was diagnosed with early onset memory loss. With her husband, she tells their story and looks positively in the face of an unknown future. Created as part of the ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer’s Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth.
results.description: Carmel is a retired school teacher, wife, mother and grandmother. Her family’ s life dramatically changed when she was diagnosed with early onset memory loss. results.title: I don't care what the Bible says
results.material_description: Digital screen recording of @theyoungturks' TikTok account
results.brief_description: On November 5, 2018, Ana Kasparian delivered an impassioned response to American conservatives justifying their denial of women’s reproductive freedoms based on their Christian faith. On May 4 2022, when leaked documents foreshadowed the overturning of Roe v Wade – which enshrines the right to abortion in the US Constitution – the viral clip resurfaced, gaining over 101k retweets, 8,613 quote tweets and over 321k likes on just one Twitter account, demonstrating how viral content can resurface and resonate again years after its original publication. Attacks on women’s body autonomy, sadly, go back far further than 2018.
results.title_for_label: I don’t care what the Bible says
results.description:
This video features in a responsive display in the museum that presents the moments, stories and memes capturing the zeitgeist by going viral on the internet.

On November 5, 2018, Ana Kasparian delivered an impassioned response to American conservatives justifying their denial of women’s reproductive freedoms based on their Christian faith. On May 4 2022, when leaked documents foreshadowed the overturning of Roe v Wade – which enshrines the right to abortion in the US Constitution – the viral clip resurfaced, gaining over 101k retweets, 8,613 quote tweets and over 321k likes on just one Twitter account, demonstrating how viral content can resurface and resonate again years after its original publication.
description_for_label: On November 5, 2018, Ana Kasparian delivered an impassioned response to American conservatives justifying their denial of women’s reproductive freedoms based on their Christian faith. On May 4 2022, when leaked documents foreshadowed the overturning of Roe v Wade – which enshrines the right to abortion in the US Constitution – the viral clip reemerged, gaining over 101k retweets, 8,613 quote tweets and over 321k likes on just one Twitter account, demonstrating how viral content can resurface and resonate again years after its original publication.

results.title: Hotline Bling

constellations_other.name: Turrell (placeholder)
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with both hip hop music and reality TV royalty.

results.description: “Hotline Bling” is a song recorded by Canadian rapper Drake, which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views (2016). The famed music video, inspired by James Turrell’s artworks, was directed by Director X.
description_for_label: “Hotline Bling” is a song recorded by Canadian rapper Drake, which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views (2016). The famed music video, inspired by James Turrell’s artworks, was directed by Director X.

results.title: Inside Kendall Jenner’s Cozy L.A. Hideaway

constellations_other.name: Turrell (placeholder)
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with both hip hop music and reality TV royalty.

results.description: Kendall Jenner welcomes Architecture Digest for a tour of her serene LA home. Just off the entry, a signature James Turrell ovoid wall sculpture greets visitors with a dreamy chromatic display, the first of many personal artistic accents woven throughout her home.
description_for_label: Kendall Jenner welcomes Architecture Digest for a tour of her serene LA home. Just off the entry, a signature James Turrell ovoid wall sculpture greets visitors with a dreamy chromatic display, the first of many personal artistic accents woven throughout her home.

results.title: Crash Zone: No News is Good News
results.creator_credit: Pino Amenta, Kevin Nemeth, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description:
The kids are alone at Catalyst and having a great time when Kimberley arrives. She’s a news reporter, there to do a story on the testers. Mike is flattered but the other kids begin to suspect she’s a spy. Pi finally succeeds in getting rid of Kimberley only to find her own mother has tracked her to Catalyst. Pi’s unmasked. Now everybody knows she’s a rich kid.
Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.

results.title: Crash Zone: Undercover
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Philip Dalkin, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description:
Alex’s valuable necklace goes missing at Catalyst and everyone is a suspect. Pi feels particularly that she needs to prove her innocence although Virgil’s idea of helping by downloading Detective Stories from the Net is making things more difficult. When Marcello’s little sister Sam is lost on the streets, the kids have two demanding cases on their hands.
Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.

results.title: Crash Zone: The Shadow
results.creator_credit: Pino Amenta, Anthony Morris, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description:
Marcello throws Catalyst into uproar when he hacks into Alex’s system. Alex brings in legendary hacker-tracker J.D. Moon to find the security breach. Marcello is too scared to own up to his foolishness and as J.D. Moon gets closer to the truth, the kids have to choose whether to help Marcello or not. When Alex discovers the truth, she fires Marcello.
Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.

results.title: Crash Zone: The Dream Team
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Philip Dalkin, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description:
A coded message on the Net becomes an irresistible puzzle for Mike, Pi, Bec, Marcello and Ram. Following the clues leads them to a meeting with Alexandra Davis, head of Software company Catalyst, and a job testing video games after school! The job of their dreams which brings unexpected surprises including the discovery of Virgil, a strange artificial intelligence loose on the Net.
Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.

results.title: Crash Zone: Heroes
results.creator_credit: Ray Boseley, Kevin Nemeth, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description:
Marcello feels rejected when Alex dismisses his idea for a video game based on Virgil. Mike too is deflated when he finds that his hero, Stig MaCallister, creator of his favourite comic, is rude and aggressive. Tempted by an offer from Sunijim representative, Brad Kane, Marcello eventually realises Brad is an even bigger scammer than himself.
Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.
